org.middleheaven.io.repository.machine
Class MachineFiles

java.lang.Object
  org.middleheaven.io.repository.machine.MachineFiles

public class MachineFiles
extends Object

Utility class to provide access to recurrently used machine file system's ManagedFile.

Method Summary
static ManagedFile ensureMachineFile(ManagedFile managedFile)
          Ensures the managedFile is a machine file.

Method Detail

getDefaultFolder

public static ManagedFile getDefaultFolder()

getUserWorkspaceFolder

public static ManagedFile getUserWorkspaceFolder()
Provides simplified access to the user's home folder. This method translates the path found at System.getProperty("user.home") using the MachineFileSystemRepositoryProvider.

Returns:
a ManagedFile that represents the user home folder.

resolveFile

public static ManagedFile resolveFile(File file)
Retrieves the ManagedFile that corresponds with the given File. This method translates the path found at file.toURI() using the MachineFileSystemRepositoryProvider.

Parameters:
file - the file to use as basis.
Returns:
the correspondent ManagedFile.
See Also:
File.toURI()

ensureMachineFile

public static ManagedFile ensureMachineFile(ManagedFile managedFile)
                                     throws IllegalArgumentException
Ensures the managedFile is a machine file.

Parameters:
managedFile -
Returns:
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException
